duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide oversight of all financial aspects of the AD+ business, including financial planning, financial reporting, growth, development, and long-term strategic plans.
Support both annual operating plan budgeting activities and monthly forecasting processes through development and maintenance of analytical financial models.
Manage a team of financial planning analysts and help to establish annual financial goals and operating expense budgets.
Review and analyze monthly, quarter-to-date, and year-to-date actual variances vs. budget and prior forecast.
Maintain accurate revenue and variable expenses forecast by working with regional directors and create monthly budget to actual by department reports.
Recommend and implement improvements to business planning, finance, and reporting process.

education_certification.credential: Finance, Accounting, or Economics undergraduate degree required. CMA/CPA or MBA is considered a plus.
